Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I plan to return and report my findings to
Josha after I rest a short while longer.<sp:0:4:0>If you plan on entering the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>, I urge
you to do so with caution.
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>You must be Link!<sp:0:4:0>It's a pleasure to meet you.<sp:5:0:0> I am Ponnick,
of the <clr:0000>Zonai Survey Team<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, well! If it isn't Link.<sp:0:4:0>I haven't seen you since we met at the
Hyrule Field Chasm.
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you truly insist upon entering it, please
do so with an abundance of caution.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff> asked me to search the area around
Rito Village for a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>And lo and behold, I found one!
